exercising, or defending legal claims or as required whenever courts are acting in their judicial capacity.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The basis for you providing personal information and special categories of personal information comes partly from a statutory requirement, partly is necessarily connected with and/or functional to a contractual requirement under your employment contract with us or your job duties, and partly stems from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, all personal data provided by you is based on your voluntary actions and free will, however, you must provide the personal information and special categories of personal information, except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys), in order for us to fulfill our employment engagement. Not providing your personal information and special categories of personal information may prevent EPAM from carrying out the employment relationship with you and, in some circumstances, may reasonably lead to EPAM needing to terminate your employment. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you wish to provide your consent, we may process data also for additional (secondary) purposes somewhat related EPAM's activities though not strictly necessary for the commencement/ continuation of your employment relationship. Such supplementary activities may include, for example: your voluntary participation in optional activities/ initiatives which may imply the processing of your personal data such as video-shootings, interviews, articles on EPAM; participation into celebrative non-work related events and other communication initiatives published also on the employer's website; granting you the use of certain company assets for private or mixed (private and professional) purposes; providing you with legal assistance etc. Consent to the processing of data for such purposes is optional and may be withdrawn at any time: denying your consent will not affect your current or future employment relationship with EPAM, but merely your ability to take part in, or take advantage of, the optional activities/initiatives as described above. For every separate activity or a group of identical activities that EPAM may wish to conduct, which would necessitate your involvement and consequently the processing of your data, we shall duly inform you about the statutory required points, including the exact purposes of the processing and shall ask for your explicit consent prior initiation of those activities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
